title: Miya Translate 1.1 – Multi-window translation using Google Translate
content: Miya Translate is a fast and convenient multiple-window translator. If you often employ Google Translate, you are sure to appreciate Miya Translate’s ability to translate in multiple windows. The hot keys to speed up your work are: activate a translator’s window, create new windows, and launch menu-bar translator – you can do it all with […]

title: Newsletter Expert 2.1 – Templates for MS.Word
content: Don’t spend your time making newsletters, make news! Newsletters Templates for MS Word is your ultimate assistant for creating captivating newsletters in mere minutes. Choose from a growing collection of professionally-crafted, customizable newsletter templates for any kind of news.   Newsletters Templates for MS Word features over 90 great templates in a variety of styles […]

title: Reservoir Dogs – Bloody Days 1.0 – Violent Action Strategy Game
content: Shoot, kill, steal and die in pure Reservoir Dogs style as you play this top-down strategy shooter.   Unique Time-Rewind Gameplay Don’t try again, rewind. Control characters for overlapping bursts of time, in a single-player co-op mode and discover endless possibilities.   Take advantage of this highly addictive and strategic mechanic in tension-filled robberies and […]

title: Barcode Maker 2.24 – 18 different barcode standards maker
content: Barcode Maker is the fastest way to perfect 18 different barcode standards, necessary to manage and sell products all over the planet. title: DWG Viewer 1.2.4 – A lightning-fast drawing viewer for DXF and DWG files
content: DWG Viewer is a lightning-fast drawing viewer that enables you to view DXF and DWG files, just as you would in AutoCAD.   Note that: This app supports DWG(3D), DWG(2D), DXF(3D) and DXF(2D) files.   Key Features: Support AutoCAD linetype – compatibility with layout visualization. Support visualization of 3D Wireframe and Shade. Support of AutoCAD […]

title: Autopano Giga 4.4.1 – Stitch multiple images (release candidate)
content: Autopano Giga allows you to stitch 2, 20, or 2,000 images.   Version 3.0 integrates impressive new features that will definitely make you adopt Autopano Pro or Autopano Giga: Choose between 9 projection modes the one that best suits your image, including Little-Planet, Panini, Hammer, Mirror Ball, Orthographic and more. title: Dark Train 1.0 – A 2D atmospheric hardcore adventure game
content: Are you curious about what it’s like to be a disobedient squid ANN 2.35f with four tentacles controlling a whole train? Ridiculous? No! title: Bounty Train 1.0 – Explore the dangerous life of the North American/US 19th century
content: Be prepared to conquer the Wild West on rails! Mount and design your very own train with plenty of detailed equipment, hire a loyal, bold and selfless crew and travel through the dangerous Wild West. title: A Story About My Uncle 1.1 – A first person platforming adventure game
content: A Story About My Uncle is a first person platforming adventure game about a boy who searches for his lost uncle, and ends up in a world he couldn’t imagine existed. title: Shadwen – Escape From The Castle 1.0 – 3rd person stealth-action game
content: Shadwen is a 3rd person stealth-action game where the only rule is to remain unseen. Stay hidden – or the ruthless guards will kill you on sight!   Shadwen, an assassin on a quest to kill the king, has a chance encounter with an orphaned girl, Lily.
